unnormalised: Arrey yaar, these CBSE class 10th exams are like Bollywood suspense movies. Every parent is hoping for 90%+, and every student is praying for passing marks! Remember giving my roll no. slip 2 days before the exam thinking it was the end of the world? Now I'm just paying EMI on my education loan. Good luck kids, don't stress too much; life after the 12th board exam is a whole other level of crazy. BTW, my cousin scored 60% and is now chilling in Goa. Just saying!
normalised: Arrey yaar, these C-B-S-E class tenth exams are like Bollywood suspense movies. Every parent is hoping for ninety percent plus, and every student is praying for passing marks! Remember giving my roll number slip two days before the exam thinking it was the end of the world? Now I am just paying E-M-I on my education loan. Good luck kids, don't stress too much; life after the twelfth board exam is a whole other level of crazy. B-T-W, my cousin scored sixty percent and is now chilling in Goa. Just saying!
